TopicTitle: Heavy lag in VAB after leaving Actions tab

Articles.Content:
Hi there!

I´m currently playing KSP 1.12.3 with a bunch of mods. When I´m building a rocket in the VAB select and then leave the actions tab i go down from 90 to 6 fps. What could be the cause?
I have finally figured it out. When the lag hits opening and closing RCS Build Aid fixes the problem
